title: Disney Frozen 2 Walk & Glow Bruni The Salamander, Lights and Sounds Stuffed Animal, by Just Play
features: Bring home the magic and excitement of Disney’s Frozen 2 with the Disney’s Frozen 2 Walk & Glow Fire Spirit.
Bring home the magic and excitement of Disney’s Frozen 2 with the Disney’s Frozen 2 Walk & Glow Fire Spirit.
Press button on his back and Bruni lights up and walks!
Bruni the Fire Spirit is approximately 12” long.
description: Bring home the magic and excitement of Disney’s Frozen 2 with the Disney’s Frozen 2 Walk & Glow Fire Spirit. Press the button on his back and Bruni the Fire Spirit’s flames glow, just like in the movie. This sizzling salamander even walks and features sound effects from the film. Made of soft fabrics, and lit with LED lighting, Bruni is approximately 12” long. Requires 3 x AAA batteries (included). Ages 3+
